1:
Yahweh is the king!\q2 I want everyone on the earth to be glad
\q2 and the people who live on the islands in the oceans to also rejoice about that!
\q1
2:
There are very dark clouds around him;\q1 he rules completely, justly, and fairly.


\q1
3:
He sends fire in front of him,\q2 and he completely burns all his enemies in that fire.
\q1
4:
All around the world he sends lightning to flash;\q2 people on the earth see it, and it causes them to be afraid and to tremble.
\q1
5:
The mountains melt like wax in front of Yahweh,\q2 in front of the one who is the Lord, who rules over all the earth.


\q1
6:
The angels in heaven proclaim that he acts righteously,\q2 and all the people groups see his glory.
\q1
7:
Everyone who worships idols should be ashamed;\q2 all those who are proud of their false gods should realize that their gods are useless.
\q1 All those gods will bow down to worship Yahweh.
\q1
8:
The people of Jerusalem heard that God is just, and they rejoiced;\q2 people in the other cities in Judah also rejoiced
\q2 because Yahweh judges and punishes wicked people.


\q1
9:
Yahweh is the supreme King over all the earth;\q2 he has very great power, and none of the other gods has any power.
\q1
10:
Yahweh loves those who hate what people do that is evil;\q2 he protects the lives of his people,
\q2 and he rescues them when the wicked people try to harm them.
\q1
11:
He makes the righteous people truly live;\q2 he causes those who are righteous in their inner beings to rejoice.


\q1
12: You righteous people, rejoice about what Yahweh has done,\q2 and thank him, our holy God!
